title: Java Programming Masterclass (Java 17/21)
description: Comprehensive guide to Core Java, Multithreading, and OOP principles. Updated for Java 17/21.

title: Java Multithreading, Concurrency & Performance Optimization
description: Deep dive into Multithreading, Memory Management, and low-level Java concurrency for system scale.

title: JSP, Servlets and JDBC for Beginners: Build a Database App
description: Covers JSP 2.3 and Servlets 3.1. Learn to build web applications with MVC architecture and database connectivity.

title: Java EE: Servlets and JavaServer Pages (JSP)
description: A focused course on the fundamentals of Java web application concepts, handling requests, and server-side logic.

title: SOAP Web Services with JAX-WS
description: Learn JAX-WS, SOAP, and XML standards. Essential for legacy enterprise system integration (EJB context).

title: RESTful Web Services with JAX-RS
description: Master REST API design, JSON representations, and JAX-RS implementation for modern microservices.

title: The Complete Oracle SQL Certification Course
description: Master Oracle SQL from scratch. Covers complex queries, database design, and performance tuning.

title: PostgreSQL for Everybody Specialization
description: Comprehensive SQL and Database Design course focusing on PostgreSQL, data modeling, and performance.

title: System Design Masterclass (2026 Edition)
description: Architecting scalable systems. Covers load balancing, caching, sharding, and HLD/LLD patterns.

title: Mastering the System Design Interview
description: Focuses on LLD (Low-Level Design) and HLD (High-Level Design) through real-world FAANG architectural problems.

title: Spring Boot 3, Spring 6 & Hibernate for Beginners
description: The gold standard for Spring Boot 3. Covers Security, JPA, Microservices, and REST APIs.

title: Building Scalable Java Microservices with Spring Cloud
description: Advanced microservices patterns: service discovery, config management, and API Gateways.

title: Apache Kafka Series - Learn Apache Kafka for Beginners
description: Master Kafka architecture, producers, consumers, and ecosystem components for event-driven systems.

title: RabbitMQ : Messaging with Java, Spring Boot And Spring MVC
description: In-depth guide to RabbitMQ exchanges, queues, and asynchronous messaging in Java ecosystems.

title: Redis Bootcamp for Beginners: Get Hands On with Redis
description: Learn Redis data structures, caching strategies, and integration with Spring Data Redis.
